original_text: Unto the place of the altar, which he had make there at the first: and there Abram called on the name of the Lord.
korean_text: 그가 처음으로 제단을 쌓은 곳이라 그가 거기서 여호와의 이름을 불렀더라

sentences.original_text: Unto the place of the altar
which he had make there at the first
and there Abram called on the name of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그곳에서 아브람은 주의 이름을 불렀다
